front.title: REFLEAK

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: REFLEAK simulates leak and recharge processes for refrigerant zeotropic blends. This Windows- based simulation model provides an easy-to-use package that allows estimation of composition changes of zeotropic blends in leak and recharge processes for either vapor or liquid leaks under isothermal or adiabatic conditions. All properties are calculated using the NIST Standard Reference Database 23: Reference Fluid Thermodynamic and Transport Properties - REFPROP, Version 10.0

seriesInfo.name: NIST NSRDS; NSRDS-NIST; National standard reference data series
